General.Name: Cencosud Shopping SA
General.Description: Cencosud Shopping S.A. develops, builds, administers, manages, exploits, and leases premises and spaces in shopping centers in Chile, Peru, and Colombia. The company is based in Santiago, Chile. Cencosud Shopping S.A. is a subsidiary of Cencosud S.A.
General.Address: av. Kennedy 9001, Santiago de Chile, Chile
